name: Range Slider contact Form 7
author: ABS creative

sections.description:
Range Slider contact Form 7multiple option on field with New Design.

Range Slider contact Form 7 allow visitor to easy to slide number field to make attractive form in contact form 7.

Range Slider contact Form 7 In you can be put custom color as will prefix on left, right so it make more user friendly.

Mostly Range Slider contact Form 7 to setup digit number with min and max value on range slider.

Plugin Features

** Range Slider contact Form 7 Features**

Multiple Tooltip Position
Range Setup Manually
Min value And Max value setup
manually Step add.
Slider color Setup manually
Slider Tooltip Color Customized.
Prefix Position Add
Manually Prefix Add
ToolTip Position Add
